dataQuality: REAL - Complete product data from theherbivorousbutcher.com

topProducts.name: Korean BBQ Ribs
quotes: I ordered the korean ribs, ribeye (omg, super weird to order a ribeye out loud being vegan for like 7 years
The food was fantastic, I didn't expect it to taste this great!
Korean ribs are a fan favorite. With a chewy & meaty texture inside, a brown sugar dry rub offers a crispy exterior
topProducts.description: Tender seitan Korean ribs packed with sweet and savory flavor. Grill, toss in salads, or make kabobs for a satisfying plant-based feast.
topProducts.ingredients: Vital wheat gluten, apple juice, water, soy sauce, brown sugar, chickpea flour, sesame seeds
cookingInstructions: Pan Fry: Medium heat until heated through
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Best-selling item, tender meaty texture, perfect sweet-savory balance, versatile for multiple cooking methods

topProducts.name: Pepperoni
quotes: Their cured 'meats' are their home run (imo) pepperoni/summer sausage etc
I picked up... pepperoni... and Cajun jerky
Moderately spicy, slightly smoky, with Italian herbs and spices
topProducts.description: Moderately spicy, slightly smoky, and made with an elegant balance of Italian herbs and spices. Perfect for pizza, calzones, pasta & more.
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Classic zesty flavor, perfect for pizza, versatile cured meat

topProducts.name: Italian Sausage
quotes: The Italian sausages snap with that perfect casing bite
One of our boldest staples with all the classic flavors you crave
Perfect snap, ideal for grilling or pasta
topProducts.description: Packed with Italian seasoning, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, fennel, herbs, and red pepper flakes. Comes with 4 fully-cooked brat links.
topProducts.ingredients: Water, vital wheat gluten, pinto beans, soy sauce, extra virgin olive oil, natural flavor, tamari, sun dried tomatoes, spices, fennel, liquid smoke
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Perfect snap texture, bold Italian flavors, ideal for grilling or pasta

topProducts.name: Pastrami
quotes: The legend. The favorite. The one you always come back to
I picked up... some pastrami, a sriracha brat, pepperoni
Deeply seasoned with cracked pepper, coriander, and warm spices
topProducts.description: Top fan-favorite deeply seasoned with cracked pepper, coriander, and warm spices. Slow-crafted for bold deli flavor and sliced just right for that classic bite.
topProducts.ingredients: Vital wheat gluten, tomato juice, water, natural flavor, extra virgin olive oil, liquid smoke, soy sauce, tomato paste, beet powder, salt, miso paste, spices
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Authentic New York-style deli flavor, star of their Italian Cold Cut sandwich, perfect for hot melts and sandwiches

topProducts.name: Italian Cold Cut Sandwich
quotes: AMAZING, all of their hot sandwiches are yummy
Sandwiches are massive and well worth the charge
I've had the Italian cold cut maybe 4 times - it's the best
topProducts.description: As seen on Food Network's Diners, Drive-ins and Dives! Featuring house-made pastrami, capicola ham, pepperoni, and mozzarella cheese on a hoagie with vegan mayo and fresh veggies.
topProducts.availability: In-store pickup or delivery only (DoorDash, Uber Eats, GrubHub)
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Food Network featured, massive portions, grab-and-go option, house-made meats and cheeses

topProducts.name: Aged Cheddar Cheese
quotes: Sharp, creamy, and endlessly versatile
Bold enough for snacking, smooth enough for melting
This cheddar shows up with big flavor every time
topProducts.description: Sharp, creamy cheddar with classic tangy flavor. Dairy-free and delicious - perfect for snacking, melting, shredding, or slicing.
topProducts.ingredients: Soy milk (water, soybeans), coconut oil, tapioca flour, water, natural flavor, salt, kappa carrageenan, tomato paste, miso paste, apple cider vinegar, spices
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Sharp authentic cheddar flavor, melts beautifully, made in-house with soy milk and coconut oil base
